articles.author: Jeff Stein, Vickie Elmer
articles.title: Thousands without power in Kentucky, Tennessee, Michigan after storms - The Washington Post
articles.description: Storms have knocked out power for more than 1 million Americans and caused at least 10 deaths, after heavy winds and possible tornadoes pummeled Kentucky, Michigan, and other parts of the South and Midwest.
